meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Seth Tribble Marika Kuspa Dinu Nesan Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6749.

td.p: Seth Tribble, a statistician from New York, New York
Marika Kuspa, a graduate student of biology from South Bend, Indiana
Dinu Nesan, a postdoctoral fellow and university lecturer from Toronto, Ontario, Canada (whose 1-day cash winnings total $18,001)

tr.td: THE LADY OF SHALLOTS
FOREIGN WORDS & PHRASES
PRESIDENTS & VICE PRESIDENTS
FUNNY TV
PARKS
RECREATION

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Among the ingredients in Julia Child\'s "basic" this: vinegar (duh), olive oil, shallots & Dijon mustard')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Among the ingredients in Julia Child's "basic" this: vinegar (duh), olive oil, shallots & Dijon mustard

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', '[Dinu\'s response, "What is muchos gracias?" was originally ruled correct but later reversed during the 1st commerical break.]

muchas gracias

Dinu
Triple Stumper
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', 'Gracias is Spanish for "thank you" & this phrase means "thank you very much"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Gracias is Spanish for "thank you" & this phrase means "thank you very much"

tr.td: Dinu
Marika
Seth
AFRICAN RIVERS
KIDDY LIT
COMPLETES THE BROADWAY SHOW TITLE
2-WORD SCIENCE TERMS
REDUNDANT SOUNDING NAMES
CROSSWORD CLUES "1"
(Alex: The "1" will come up in each correct response. To help you out, I'll tell you how many squares will be occupied by the correct response.)
